name: Find in page
description:
This plugin finds layers (by their names) and text areas in your design (by their content) that contains/matches a specific phrase. It also lets you replace all appearances of the phrase with new text.


Important notes:

  • Don't search for phrases that will return lots of results. It will take a long time to get them.
  • You can't select multiple layers that aren't located in the same page


How to use:

  1. Select search scope (page/file/selection)
  2. Type a phrase
  3. Select if to match the whole word
  4. Select search elements (Layers/Texts)
  5. Run the plugin
  6. Select results / Navigate between results / replace appearances with new text
